ctx: intros a b x y H.
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, x, y : Z H : gcdZ a b = 1%Z d : Z H1 : Znumtheory.Zis_gcd a b d H2 : (0 <= d)%Z Unable to unify "Znumtheory.Zis_gcd a b d" with "congruentZ d x a".

ctx: intros a b x y H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros a b x y H.
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, x, y : Z H : gcdZ a b = 1%Z d : Z H1 : Znumtheory.Zis_gcd a b d H2 : (0 <= d)%Z Unable to unify "(0 <= d)%Z" with "congruentZ d y b".

original: intros a b x y H. destruct (Znumtheory.Zgcd_spec a b) as [d [H1 H2]]. exists d. split. - apply H1. - apply H2.
